name: Invisible Apartment 2 (itch)
description:
Invisible Apartment 2 is the next chapter of the Invisible Apartment series of cyberpunk visual novels. Set in a future where surveillance and hacking are part of every day life, it revolves around human relations, their dreams and how to lead a normal life.

Find out more at http://invisibleapartment.com

If you're interested in other visual novels we're making than feel free to visit http://vysoko.com
